The brand’s newest HomePower 3600 Plus Portable Power Station can be scored during this event at $1,614.05 shipped, after using the code OFFER5 at checkout for an additional 5% off, which beats out Amazon’s pricing by $85. Only on the market since September, we’ve been getting plenty of deals bringing costs down from its $2,799 full price, with today’s rate matching its Black Friday pricing and only being beaten out by the $1,599, $1,519, and $1,499 rates that all popped up in various stages of Prime Day savings over one week in October. items.title: All-new Sharge ICEMAG 3 Qi2.2 25W 10K power bank with active cooling, USB-C cable, more now up for grabs [Launch deal]
items.summary:
Sharge already has some of the most unique power banks on the market, and it just added another one to its lineup. The brand just unleashed its new ICEMAG 3 Qi2.2-certified 25W power bank, and it’s now up for grabs at Amazon with a nice launch deal at $67.91 shipped. Don’t forget to clip the on-page coupon to see the discounted price during checkout. You are looking at an upgraded version of the brand’s popular ICEMAG model, featuring support for Qi2.2 25W MagSafe wireless charging. It brings a handful of new features to the table, too, and you can learn more about it below.

more…

items.title: Blow, vacuum, or mulch debris with Worx’s 3-in-1 12A Trivac system back at its $59 low (Reg. $100), more from $109
items.summary:
Amazon is offering the Worx 12A Trivac 3-in-1 Electric Leaf Blower, Vacuum & Mulcher back for $59 shipped. This 3-in-1 lawn care tool fetches $100 outside of price cuts, with the ones we’ve seen through 2025 mostly keeping costs above $69, though we have spotted some short-term dips lower to $67, $66, and one previous fall to the $59 low. You’re getting another chance at the best price we have tracked this year, thanks to the $41 markdown here. We’ve also rounded up a few other lawn care solutions from this brand below.

more…

items.title: Amazon changes how copyright protection is applied to Kindle Direct’s self-published e-books
items.summary: Amazon says it will allow authors to offer their DRM-free e-books in the EPUB and PDF formats through its self-publishing platform, Kindle Direct Publishing. Starting on January 20, 2026, authors who set their titles as DRM-free will see their books made available in these more open formats.

items.title: Just $20 for RGB keyboard and mouse? Grab this Cooler Master Devastator 3 gaming combo now
items.summary:
Cooler Master Devastator 3 RGB Gaming Keyboard | Mouse Combo

Buy for $20 (Reg. $35)

What we love

For just $20, you get a full-size keyboard with dedicated media controls and 6-zone RGB lighting, paired with a matching mouse featuring an optical sensor, ambidextrous shape, and its own RGB accents. It doesn’t get much better than this if you’re looking to pick up some new peripherals on a budget.
